oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Preparations for the battle of New Orleans
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Print entitled English Soldiers throwing up a Battery. Shows preparations for the Battle of New Orleans. Two soldiers carry pick axes, and two soldiers shovel dirt.
Both British and American troops constructed batteries during the cmapaign for New Orleans in late 1814/early 1815.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: New Orleans, Battle of, New Orleans, La., 1815;Southern States--History--War of 1812;Louisiana--History--War of 1812
Soldiers
